::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Liono, listening to his suggestion.

"If we're going to discuss battle tactics, it would be better to have at 
least some of our factions present."

He turns to Nemesis. "Nemesis, return to base. There may be a meeting soon, I 
will contact you about it. If there is, take Zergling and Dark One and meet 
me at the meeting coordinates."
